post.description: Add rolling stock take/count. Rolling stock count will create a stock count header for every day (UTC based). Every request will create a session, adds all entries into the stock count recounts all totals and discrepancies. WMS location or batched items requires BatchInventoryId to be specified. If you are submitting stock level for item that doesn't have batch inventory you must create it first, get its id and submit in the count The method validates all entries, if any errors encountered the whole request will be rejected. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.StockTake.RollingStockCountNode

Returns the list of BinRacks by BinRack Ids for WMS locations.

Create a new warehouse move in state of In Transit or Open. To create a new move you need the exact batch inventory id and bin rack id of the destination. However it is possible to create a move without knowing where it is going specifically, in which case don't supply BinrackIdDestination (or send null) Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.Inventory.WarehouseManagement.StockMoveNode

SessionDuriationSeconds.description: Time in seconds the stock take session has taken

Items.description: List of stock take items. Maximum 1000 items in a stock take session

BinRack.description: (optional) Only applicable to non-batched and non-WMS locations. Singular BinRack will be updated for the given item for a given location. Will be ignored for a batched or WMS item.

PickingWaveItems.description:
(optional) Pickwave items associated with the batch. This data will be used for concurrency check and validation of data. 
Super important stuff when you are submitting batch inventory stock count in WMS location. 
Order items will automatically be allocated to a specific batch when the order is placed/printed/added to pickwave. This will normally block stock count, 
however it is possible to get the state of pickwave items, and if all items are picked from the location the user can still count them. When stock count is submitted
we need to also submit the state of the pickwave at the point of count, so we can compare state was and the state is, discount any stock from the count that was processed/shipped	
If this parameter is not supplied and the batch is allocated to orders, the stock count for this item will be blocked and will not be submitted

OriginalQuantity.description: (Optional) Original quantity, used to validate if the original has changed since the items have been counted. If supplied and different to expected then an error will be returned.

StockValue.description: (optional) Stock value (unit cost * quantity). If not provided it will be calculated from current stock value

BatchInventoryId.description:
(conditional) If item is batched or in WMS location, you must provide BatchInventoryId which is being updated. 
If its newly discovered item, use BookInStockBatch call in Stock controller to create a new batch inventory

UserName.description: User name to whom the pickwave was/is allocated. If unallocated this will be null

UserId.description: User Id to whom the pickwave was/is allocated. If unallocated this will be null

ErroredItems.description: List of items that have failed validation, if any items are returned then the stock take won't be submitted.

BinRack.description: (optional) Only applicable to non-batched and non-WMS locations. Singular BinRack will be updated for the given item for a given location. Will be ignored for a batched or WMS item.

PickingWaveItems.description:
(optional) Pickwave items associated with the batch. This data will be used for concurrency check and validation of data. 
Super important stuff when you are submitting batch inventory stock count in WMS location. 
Order items will automatically be allocated to a specific batch when the order is placed/printed/added to pickwave. This will normally block stock count, 
however it is possible to get the state of pickwave items, and if all items are picked from the location the user can still count them. When stock count is submitted
we need to also submit the state of the pickwave at the point of count, so we can compare state was and the state is, discount any stock from the count that was processed/shipped	
If this parameter is not supplied and the batch is allocated to orders, the stock count for this item will be blocked and will not be submitted

Errors.description: List of errors for specific stock take item

OriginalQuantity.description: (Optional) Original quantity, used to validate if the original has changed since the items have been counted. If supplied and different to expected then an error will be returned.

StockValue.description: (optional) Stock value (unit cost * quantity). If not provided it will be calculated from current stock value

BatchInventoryId.description:
(conditional) If item is batched or in WMS location, you must provide BatchInventoryId which is being updated. 
If its newly discovered item, use BookInStockBatch call in Stock controller to create a new batch inventory

SKU.description: SKU - Optional if stock item id is provided

StockItemId.description: StockItemId - Optional if stock SKU is provided, calls will be faster if this is provided.

StockLocationName.description: Stock location name, optional if StockLocationId is provided.

StockLocationId.description: Stock Location Id, optional if StockLocationName is provided, calls will be faster if this is provided.

StockValue.description: StockValue - Optional, if unit cost is provided then value will be calculated from this, otherwise existing stock value or purchase price will be used.

UnitCost.description: UnitCost - Optional, if stock value is provided then value will be calculated from this, otherwise existing stock value or purchase price will be used.

Binrack.description: Binrack - Optional, if not provided or empty exisitng binrack will remain.

RowIndex.description: RowIndex - Optional, can be used to marry up request items with response items.

StockValue.description: StockValue - Optional, if unit cost is provided then value will be calculated from this, otherwise existing stock value or purchase price will be used.

Binrack.description: Binrack - Optional, if not provided or empty exisitng binrack will remain.

RowIndex.description: RowIndex - Optional, can be used to marry up request items with response items.

isBatchedStockType.description: Returns true is the stock item is tracked by batch

TaxRate.description: Default item tax rate. Set -1 to use country tax rate

InventoryTrackingType.description: Stock item tracking type. 0 = none. 1 = Ordered by Sell by Date. 2 = Ordered by Priority Sequence

BatchNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan batch number when procesing orders

SerialNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan item serial number when processing ordesr

EntriesPerPage.description: Result page size, quantity of records per page

pkVariationItemId.description: The id of the group to rename

pkStockItemIds.description: The list of item ids to add

request.description: Contains variation group id 'VariationItemId' and id list of child items 'StockItemIds'

Result page size, quantity of records per page

MinimumLevel.description: Minimum level of stock item. -1 is not tracked

TaxRate.description: Default item tax rate. Set -1 to use country tax rate

InventoryTrackingType.description: Stock item tracking type. 0 = none. 1 = Ordered by Sell by Date. 2 = Ordered by Priority Sequence

BatchNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan batch number when procesing orders

SerialNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan item serial number when processing ordesr

stockIdentifier.description: Made up of a string key, used to search Item Number, Barcode Number, Supplier Code and Supplier Basrcode Fields as well as Stock Location.

loadCompositeParents.description: Whether you want to load composite parents or ignore them

loadVariationParents.description: Whether you want to load variation parents

entriesPerPage.description: The amount of entries you require. Maximum 200.

pageNumber.description: The current page number you are requesting

dataRequirements.description: The data you require. eg. StockLevels will load the stock levels for each location

searchTypes.description: The parameters that you would like to search by

StockItemFull.description: Stock item with full level and supplier information

isBatchedStockType.description: Returns true is the stock item is tracked by batch

TaxRate.description: Default item tax rate. Set -1 to use country tax rate

InventoryTrackingType.description: Stock item tracking type. 0 = none. 1 = Ordered by Sell by Date. 2 = Ordered by Priority Sequence

BatchNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan batch number when procesing orders

SerialNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan item serial number when processing ordesr

SupplierMinOrderQty.description: Minimum order quantity from this supplier

Due.description: Due to come in purchase orders

JIT.description: Stock Item Just In Time (JIT) status

UnitCost.description:
if( Quantity == 0 )
    dbo.StockItem.PurchasePrice
Else
CurrentStockValue / Quantity

LastUpdateDate.description: Last time stock level was adjusted

StockItemPurchasePrice.description: Stock item purchase price. It's used to calculate UnitCost

IsMain.description: Is the image the main image

RawChecksum.description: Raw file checksum (Used for UI to determine if the image file is the same before submitting for upload)

InventoryStockLocation.description: Simplified StockLocation information for use in settings screen

IsFulfillmentCenter.description: If location is a fulfilment center

IsWarehouseManaged.description: If the location is warehosue managed.

request.description: Object with a list of pkStockItemIds and Data Requirements

StockItemFullExtended.description: Stock item with full extended details.

isBatchedStockType.description: Returns true is the stock item is tracked by batch

TaxRate.description: Default item tax rate. Set -1 to use country tax rate

IsCompositeParent.description: True if the stock item is a composition

InventoryTrackingType.description: Stock item tracking type. 0 = none. 1 = Ordered by Sell by Date. 2 = Ordered by Priority Sequence

BatchNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan batch number when procesing orders

SerialNumberScanRequired.description: User must scan item serial number when processing ordesr

StockItemIds.description: List of stock item ids to get stock level

GetStockLevel_BatchResponse.description: Response class with info about stock level in each location for a list of stock items

StockItemLevels.description: List of stock level for each location

Location.description: Stock location to be delivered to

Total.description: Total price stock was sold for
Total price stock was sold for

Detail.description: List of sold stock item information details

Total.description: Total price stock was sold for

stockLevels.description: The new stock items levels to set
The new stock items levels to adjust

stockItem.description: Book in parameters used to update stock items

BookInStockItem.description: Book in parameters used to update stock items

CostPerUnit.description: Cost of the item for this order

BinRack.description: Binrack of the item to be booked in.

InventoryTrackingType.description: 0 - None, 1 - Order by sell by date, 2 - Ordered by priority sequence

PickedQuantity.description: Indicate how many units are now allocated in open orders

InTransfer.description: Number of items in Transfer phase.

BinRacks.description: List of binracks available for the given item in the order applicability.

RoutingSequence.description: Sequence in which the picking or stock movement should be done. Routing.

CurrentFullPercentage.description: Maximum volumetric capacity of the location WxDxH = volumetric

MaxQuantityCapacity.description: How full the bin rack is in percentage 0 to 100, based on the max quantity or max volumetric capacity. Updated everytime stock is moved in or out.

CurrentQuantity.description: Current total quantity of all items in the bin rack. Updated everytime stock is moved in or out.

CurrentVolumetric.description: Current calculation of total volumetric total for all items in the binrack. Updated everytime stock is moved in or out.

OptimalReplenishFullPercentage.description: Based on the fill percentage, indicates the bin rack as needs replenishment. Auto recalculated based on the consumption.

CriticalReplenishFullPercentage.description: User fixed fill percentage. When it reaches this level the binrack is considered for replenishment.

TypeName.description: Readonly value of the TypeName loaded from BinRackTypeId

StandardType.description: Readonly value of the Standard type loaded from BinRackTypeId

IsVolumetric.description: Readonly value indicates if the Type is Volumumetric

AccessOrientation.description: Direction the item should be accessed from.

StorageGroups.description: List of storage groups either for the whole binrack or relevant to specific stock item.

IsValidForStockItem.description: Indicates if the binrack is valid for the supplied stockitem.

BinRackTypeId.description: Binrack type id - unique record identifier

Name.description: Custom name for bin rack type

StandardType.description:
Binrack Standard Type  Id 
1 - Picking
2 - Special Access Picking
3 - Storage
4 - Deep Storage
5 - Putaway
6 - Quality Assurance
7 - Scrap / Quarantine
8 - Returns
0 - Flexible

LocationBound.description: Identifies whether the bin rack type is bound to a specific location

IsVolumetric.description: Is type restricted to volumetric measurements only

DefaultBatchStatus.description: Sets the default status for batches in this binrack type

BatchInventoryId.description: Batch Inventory Id of the stock item you are moving

BinrackIdDestination.description: Destination if known, can be null

JobId.description: If the move is part of a specific job, specify job id so it can be marked off from the job

TotId.description: (Optional) Move to TOT id, create or retrive tot scan barcode first. To unassign from Tot send 0

TxType.description: Type of the move. Open means its an instruction to move, In Transit actually marks the item as unavilable and physically being moved

BinrackDestination.description: Destination if known, otherwise will be null

Batch.description: Detailed batch information, batch inventory is in Inventory class

BatchId.description: Batch Id, more detailed information about the batch is in Batch class
